projects.title: Improve Board Responsiveness and Scrolling
projects.summary: Improve scrolling and responsiveness of the project board to make it more usable on all devices.
projects.details:
**Goal:** Fix infinite scroll, reduce data load (esp. mobile)

**Specific Issues:**
- Scrolling doesn't allow the user to scroll through longer lists of details, as reported by Elliott
- Implement fix for scrolling and make sure that a user can see all the contents. This means that content from lower screen can be access and usable.

**Implementation Notes:**
Make updates to the html for scroll and overflow management. What's left before it can be closed?

**Definition of Done**:
* Elliott must be able to access all aspects of the board via scrolling AND adding new cards, also being able to manipulate all parts of the board!
